oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bob Rieley Collection - tape 9
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 9 of various performances featuring Lester Flatt (performer), Earl Scruggs (performer), Curly Fox (performer), Benny Martin (performer), Bill Monroe (performer), Tommy Magness (performer), and Red Herron (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Benny Martin; Tommy Magness; Curly Fox; Bill Monroe; Lester Flatt; Red Herron; Earl Scruggs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Bill Cheatham (Benny Martin) -- Soldier's Joy (Tommy Magness) -- Fiddler's Dream (Tommy Magness) -- Black Mountain Rag (Tommy Magness) -- Red Wing (Tommy Magness) -- Rag Time Annie (Tommy Magness) -- Comin' Down From Roanoke (Tommy Magness) -- Old Joe Clark ([Unidentified]) -- Soldier's Joy (Benny Martin) -- White House Blues (Tommy Magness) -- Lost Indian (Benny Martin) -- Fire On The Mountain (Benny Martin) -- Comin' Down From Roanoke (Tommy Magness) -- Devil's Dream (Tommy Magness) -- Tennessee Wagoner (Tommy Magness) -- Natural Blues (Tommy Magness) -- Don't Love Nobody (Curly Fox) -- Bluegrass Special (Bill Monroe, Earl Scruggs) -- Will You Be Loving Another Man (Lester Flatt) -- Arkansas Traveler (Tommy Magness) -- Cotton Eyed Joe (Tommy Magness) -- Comin' Down From Roanoke (Tommy Magness) -- Dusty Miller (Tommy Magness) -- Back Up And Push (Red Herron) -- Bill Cheatham (Tommy Magness) -- Sally Goodwin (Tommy Magness) -- Cotton Eyed Joe (Benny Martin) -- Corral Court Blues (Tommy Magness) [unconfirmed] -- Alabama Jubilee (Tommy Magness) -- Drag The Bow (Tommy Magness) -- Boil The Cabbage (Tommy Magness) -- Black Mountain Rag (Tommy Magness) -- Arkansas Traveler ([Unidentified]) -- [Unidentified recording]
